headline: Stable negative sentiment (score: -118.4)
key_insights: Fears trending up 86% over 7 days (strong momentum)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations explode with 155 quotes and 101 at strong intensity - people are absolutely furious today.
• This frustration surge jumps from yesterday's already-elevated level to near the peak of the 41-day range.
• Optimism remains deeply negative despite a small uptick, while fears recovered significantly but stay below average.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
